name: Project: 42
description:
Destroy everything as hordes of red try to destroy you! Due to an experiment gone wrong, your mind can work 2000% faster, but only while standing still. Complete all 8 levels by taking out any enemy standing in your way!

HTML5 VERSION COMING VERY SOON. FOLLOW FOR UPDATES.

Features:

8 intense levels! Battle through waves of red to claim the victory!

Insane Slow-Motion! Time moves when you do - Slow down time to outsmart your foes!

Global Leaderboards! Compete for first place!

Made in 72 hours for the ScoreSpace Game Jam #5.

Pre-made assets:

  • Gun SFX- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fAOvDgt_PgY
  • Font - https://www.urbanfonts.com/fonts/Miami.font
  • Crosshair - Kenny.nl Crosshair Pack.
  • Music - Pitch Black by Jens Kiilstofte.
  • Leaderboards by DreamLo.

Everything else was made during the jam.
